snippet.title: PROZE Announcement Trailer – Anatoly's story
snippet.description:
PROZE is a VR survival adventure. Set in both past and present, it’s a story of friendship and duty, fear, and dignity of the people facing the Soviet government and its echoes. Explore a Cold-War era military research facility, deal with the anomalies, solve the puzzles, and find out the answers.

PROZE comes out February 2019.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/912560/PROZE_Prologue/
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/2224518224242612/
http://signsine.com/proze-vr/
https://twitter.com/SignSineGames
https://www.facebook.com/prozegame/
